name: part_010
file: tmp_真夏のReGLOSSカラオケ！〜新曲披露もあるよ〜【#真夏のReGLOSS】 [DiHB5voNt00]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: MC section between songs. The members are out of breath and discuss the next performance.

subtitles.original: そうして知った痛みが
subtitles.english: The pain I came to know...

subtitles.original: 未だに僕を支えている
subtitles.english: ...still supports me even now.

subtitles.original: 「イマ」というほうき星 今も一人追いかけている
subtitles.english: The shooting star called "Now", I'm still chasing it alone.

subtitles.original: もう一度君に会おうとして
subtitles.english: Trying to meet you once more,

subtitles.original: 望遠鏡をまた担いで
subtitles.english: I shoulder my telescope again.

subtitles.original: 前と同じ午前二時
subtitles.english: 2 AM, just like before,

subtitles.original: フミキリまで駆けてくよ
subtitles.english: I'll run to the railroad crossing.

subtitles.original: 始めようか天体観測
subtitles.english: Shall we begin the stargazing?

subtitles.original: 二分後に君が来なくとも
subtitles.english: Even if you don't come in two minutes.

subtitles.original: 「イマ」というほうき星
subtitles.english: The shooting star called "Now",

subtitles.original: 君と二人追いかけている
subtitles.english: I'm chasing it together with you.

subtitles.original: なんでこんな疲れてんだ...
subtitles.english: Why am I so tired...

subtitles.original: めっちゃ踊ってくれたー！
subtitles.english: You danced so much for us!

subtitles.original: 踊ってたっていうかパフォーマンス！
subtitles.english: It wasn't just dancing, it was a performance!

subtitles.original: 二人でね、ほうき星探しに行ってたんだよね。
subtitles.english: The two of us went looking for the shooting star, didn't we?

subtitles.original: めっちゃ歩き回っちゃった！
subtitles.english: I walked around so much!

subtitles.original: 全員ちょっとヘトヘト...
subtitles.english: Everyone is a bit exhausted...

subtitles.original: はじめはもう一曲目からもうヘトヘトですけれども。
subtitles.english: Hajime has been exhausted since the first song, though.

subtitles.original: でもね、このままちょっとらでんと番長の二人を聴きたいなーなんて思ってるんですけれども！
subtitles.english: But you know, I was thinking I'd like to hear a bit of Raden and Bancho right now!

subtitles.original: いいよ！いいよ！
subtitles.english: Sure! Sure!

subtitles.original: 徒歩じゃなくて、チャリで駆け上がりますか！
subtitles.english: Instead of walking, shall we dash up on a bike!

subtitles.original: 準備いいですか？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: はい！じゃあ音楽お願いします！
subtitles.english: Yes! Then, music please!

subtitles.original: 夏色 / 北川悠仁 作詞・作曲
subtitles.english: Natsuiro / Lyrics & Composition by Yujin Kitagawa

subtitles.original: 夏といえばでしょー！
subtitles.english: It's summer, after all!

subtitles.original: 駐車場のネコは アクビをしながら
subtitles.english: The cat in the parking lot is yawning,

subtitles.original: 今日も一日を過ごしてゆく
subtitles.english: and spending another day.

subtitles.original: 何ら変わらない 穏やかな街並み
subtitles.english: The peaceful cityscape hasn't changed at all.

subtitles.original: みんな夏が来たって 浮かれ気分なのに 君は一人さえな顔してるネ
subtitles.english: Even though everyone is in a festive mood because summer is here, you have a gloomy look on your face all by yourself.

subtitles.original: そうだ君に
subtitles.english: That's right, to you,

subtitles.original: 見せたい物があるんだ
subtitles.english: there's something I want to show.

subtitles.original: 大きな五時半の夕焼け 子供の頃と同じように
subtitles.english: The big sunset at 5:30, just like when we were kids.

subtitles.original: 海も空も雲も 僕等でさえも 染めていくから...
subtitles.english: Because it's going to dye the sea, the sky, the clouds, and even us...

subtitles.original: この長い長い下り坂を
subtitles.english: Down this long, long downhill slope,

subtitles.original: 君を自転車の後ろに乗せて
subtitles.english: with you riding on the back of my bicycle.

subtitles.original: ブレーキいっぱい握りしめて
subtitles.english: I'll grip the brakes tight,

subtitles.original: ゆっくりゆっくり下ってく
subtitles.english: and we'll slowly, slowly go down.

subtitles.original: 風鈴の音でウトウトしながら 夢見心地で
subtitles.english: Dozing off to the sound of wind chimes, in a dreamlike state,

subtitles.original: ヨダレをたらしてる
subtitles.english: and drooling.

subtitles.original: Woh... いつもと同じ 網戸ごしの風の匂い
subtitles.english: Woh... the same as always, the scent of the wind through the screen door.

subtitles.original: 休日でみんなも ゴロゴロしてるのに
subtitles.english: Even though everyone is just lounging around on their day off,

subtitles.original: 君はずいぶん忙しい顔をしてるネ
subtitles.english: you have such a busy-looking face.

subtitles.original: そうだいつかの あの場所へ行こう
subtitles.english: That's right, let's go to that place from that one time.

subtitles.original: 真夏の夜の波の音は 不思議な程心静かになる
subtitles.english: The sound of the waves on a midsummer night makes one feel strangely calm.

subtitles.original: 少しだけ全て忘れて
subtitles.english: Forget everything for just a little while,

subtitles.original: 波の音の中包み込まれていく
subtitles.english: and be enveloped in the sound of the waves.

subtitles.original: この細い細い裏道を抜けて
subtitles.english: Going through this narrow, narrow back alley,

subtitles.original: 誰もいない大きな夜の海見ながら
subtitles.english: while looking at the big, empty night sea,

subtitles.original: 線香花火に二人で
subtitles.english: together, to our sparklers,

subtitles.original: ゆっくりゆっくり火をつける
subtitles.english: we'll slowly, slowly light them.

subtitles.original: いつか君の涙が こぼれおちそうになったら
subtitles.english: If your tears ever seem about to overflow,

subtitles.original: 何もしてあげられないけど 少しでもそばにいるよ...
subtitles.english: I might not be able to do anything, but I'll be by your side, even if just a little...

subtitles.original: この長い長い下り坂を
subtitles.english: Down this long, long downhill slope,

subtitles.original: 君を自転車の後ろに乗せて
subtitles.english: with you riding on the back of my bicycle.

subtitles.original: ブレーキいっぱい握りしめて
subtitles.english: I'll grip the brakes tight,

subtitles.original: ゆっくりゆっくり下ってく
subtitles.english: and we'll slowly, slowly go down.

subtitles.original: ゆっくりゆっくり下ってく
subtitles.english: Slowly, slowly going down.

subtitles.original: ゆっくりゆっくり下ってく
subtitles.english: Slowly, slowly going down.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!
